column2: As result of a recent war, $FROMCOUNTRY$ was transferred to us in vassalage. Officials in $CAPITAL$ are finishing the preparations to welcome the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ people in the $COUNTRY_ADJ$ empire.
With the union of our old masters in the greater country of $FROMCOUNTRY$, our new overlords started to make the arrangements for our renewed vassalage to the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ government.
We have no choice in this matter.
Become a vassal nation's new ovelord
They'll get the cores back in a second!
